Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to extending the expiration of the authorization to the county of Genesee to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the expiration of the authorization to the county of Genesee to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes from November 30, 2020 to November 30, 2023.
